trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SEQ_00<tab>Amh Garanjy is grinning eagerly, her wide eyes sparkling more than usual. ※This quest is available for a limited time only.

TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SEQ_01<tab>Amh Garanjy can't wait to see you dressed up as the Saint of Nymeia─or, rather, she will wait forever until you are dressed up as the Saint of Nymeia. In an effort to avoid the crippling effects that eternity might have upon you both, you unfold the unorthodox saint's garments and make yourself presentable.
※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SEQ_02<tab>In both style and spirit, you have become one with the Saint of Nymeia. Now it is time to carry out in deed what you have been tasked by appearance, so you make for the Greatloam Growery to pick up Tenny's gifts whenever they are ready.

TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SEQ_03<tab>Tenny, with the help of Saulinne and a notably absent snowy-bearded gentleman, has completed crafting his presents: simple-yet-beautiful woven bracelets. He earnestly instructs you to seek out his friend Momolao, who should reliably be found playing near the Quicksand. Straightening your beard, be it literal or proverbial, you sally forth to deliver Tenny's precious offerings.

TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SEQ_04<tab>Momolao is delighted with the gift, admitting that all of Tenny's friends have been unseasonably gloomy due to his recent move. You are directed towards the Gold Court and Milvaneth Sacrarium to find Larkin and Othuel, respectively, with the prediction that they will be nothing short of ecstatic to receive their presents.

TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SEQ_05<tab>The painstakingly woven gifts have been delivered accordingly, affirming what you have always known─that distance means nothing in the face of true friendship. Bearing a physical representation of such a bond, you return to Gridania to deliver joyful tidings and a present for Tenny himself.

TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SEQ_06<tab>Tenny is touched by his friends' thoughtfulness, with the realization that birds of a feather flock to bracelets together. Saulinne is relieved that the melancholy boy she was so worried about is now free to frolic with Starlight merriment as any good youngling should, and the two youths recognize the burgeoning friendship between them. You smile, reckoning that now is as good a time as any to apprise Amh Garanjy of the situation.

TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SEQ_07<tab>There is little Amh Garanjy wishes for more than happy younglings, and your deeds have done much to deliver her such. Indeed, Saulinne and Tenny arrive to cheerfully extend their thanks and receive their Starlight presents. As you watch the youngsters scurry off to play, carefree and optimistic, you reflect upon your role in bringing their happiness to fruition. Perhaps it is too soon to hang your fur-trimmed hat after all...
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TODO_00<tab>Equip the unorthodox saint's outfit and speak with Amh Garanjy.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Tenny.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TODO_02<tab>Deliver a woven bracelet to Momolao near the Quicksand.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TODO_03<tab>Deliver a woven bracelet to Larkin in the Gold Court.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TODO_04<tab>Deliver a woven bracelet to Othuel near Milvaneth Sacrarium.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TODO_05<tab>Deliver the engraved bracelet to Tenny at the Greatloam Growery.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TODO_06<tab>Report to Amh Garanjy.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_AMHGARANJY_000_000<tab>Without further ado, let us transform you into the Saint of Nymeia! I have no doubt you will look every bit the part in the costume I gave you.

TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>You must equip the following items in order to proceed: Unorthodox Saint's Cap, Unorthodox Saint's Halfrobe, Unorthodox Saint's Gloves, Unorthodox Saint's Bottoms, and Unorthodox Saint's Longboots.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>Once you are dressed and have sufficiently fluffed your magnificent beard, speak with Amh Garanjy again.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>If any of the aforementioned items are not in your possession, you can purchase them from the recompense officer at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_AMHGARANJY_000_010<tab>Incredible! I feel as though I am addressing the very captain of legend.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_AMHGARANJY_000_011<tab>Now then, pray return to the Greatloam Growery and collect Tenny's presents. The happiness of precious younglings is in your hands!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_AMHGARANJY_000_012<tab>I know you will make a marvelous Saint of Nymeia. Won't you try on the outfit I gave you?

TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>You must equip the following items in order to proceed: Unorthodox Saint's Cap, Unorthodox Saint's Halfrobe, Unorthodox Saint's Gloves, Unorthodox Saint's Bottoms, and Unorthodox Saint's Longboots.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SYSTEM_100_013<tab>Once you are dressed and have sufficiently fluffed your magnificent beard, speak with Amh Garanjy again.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SYSTEM_000_014<tab>If any of the aforementioned items are not in your possession, you can purchase them from the recompense officer at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_AMHGARANJY_000_020<tab>Tenny awaits you at the Greatloam Growery. Please ensure his presents are delivered safely!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SAULINNE_000_021<tab>Welcome back, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>! You should ask Tenny about the presents, hehe!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TENNY_000_030<tab>The presents are ready! I thought it might take longer, but the Saint of Nymeia showed us how to weave them up in no time.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TENNY_000_031<tab>We made three bracelets─one for each of my friends.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TENNY_000_032<tab>You said you'd take them to Ul'dah for me, right? My friend Momolao always hangs around outside the Quicksand, so you should start there.

TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TENNY_000_033<tab>If the others aren't with him, he'll tell you where to go. I don't know how to properly thank you for this, but...thank you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TENNY_000_040<tab>If the others aren't at the Quicksand too, Momolao should know where they are. Thanks for doing this, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>.

TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SAULINNE_000_041<tab>The Saint of Nymeia showed Tenny and me how to weave those bracelets, and making them together was a lot of fun! At least, <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> had fun. I hope Tenny did too.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_AMHGARANJY_000_042<tab>Pray hurry to Ul'dah and make your deliveries!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_MOMOLAO_000_050<tab>Yeah, I'm Momolao. What've you got for me?
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_MOMOLAO_000_051<tab>From Tenny!? Oh Tenny, you...you big dummy!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_MOMOLAO_000_052<tab>We've all been a mess since he left. It's just not the same without him.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_MOMOLAO_000_053<tab>But now I know that some things will never change, no matter how far apart we are!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_MOMOLAO_000_054<tab>He's still the same old Tenny. Still celebrating Starlight with us, hehe.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_MOMOLAO_000_055<tab>He sent gifts for <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> of us!? Oh, someone's going to cry. I can feel it.

TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_MOMOLAO_000_056<tab>Let's see─Larkin said he'd be in the Gold Court, and Othuel had to do something near Milvaneth Sacrarium. Thanks, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>. Tell Tenny “Happy Starlight” for us.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_MOMOLAO_000_060<tab>You'll find Larkin in the Gold Court and Othuel by Milvaneth Sacrarium. They're going to love their gifts, I just know it.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_LARKIN_000_070<tab>Hello, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>! I've been very good this year. You can ask my friends!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_LARKIN_000_071<tab>...H-Handmade? From Tenny?
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_LARKIN_100_071<tab><sniff> I-I'm not crying! I just got snow in my eye... <sob>
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_LARKIN_000_072<tab>...Last year, we all stood right here and made a promise to celebrate Starlight together. And Tenny remembered! Even though he moved away!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_LARKIN_000_073<tab>I thought that was the end for us, but friends always find a way, right? And Tenny will always be our friend! ...Tell him I said that, okay?
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_OTHUEL_000_080<tab>Er, how do you know my name!? ...Is that package for me?
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_OTHUEL_000_081<tab>Tenny sent this? He <var 1A 02 /var>made<var 1A 01 /var> this!? Haha, I guess he didn't forget about his mates after all.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_OTHUEL_000_082<tab>It's funny; I just finished wrapping a gift for Tenny, too. A gift from all of us.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_OTHUEL_000_083<tab>We wanted something with our names on it, so we pooled our pocket money and got him a bracelet. Great minds think alike, eh?
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_OTHUEL_000_084<tab>Anyway, if you're headed back to Gridania, could you take this to him? It'd mean a lot to us.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SYSTEM_000_090<tab>All of Tenny's gifts have been successfully distributed. Now to make your final delivery─one addressed to Tenny himself.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SAULINNE_000_095<tab>Hooray! You're back!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TENNY_000_100<tab>Did you find everyone? Did they like their presents!?
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TENNY_000_101<tab>This is...
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TENNY_000_102<tab>A bracelet? And look, they carved their names into it: “Momolao,” “Larkin,” “Orthuel”...and “Tenny”!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SAULINNE_000_103<tab>They must really miss you too. If this isn't proof of your friendship, I don't know what is!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TENNY_000_104<tab>I never thought they'd send <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> something─and it's a bracelet, too! Great minds think alike, eh?
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SAULINNE_000_105<tab>I'm so glad everything worked out! Now you can enjoy the Starlight Celebration without any more worries.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TENNY_000_106<tab>Saulinne... Thank you for helping me.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TENNY_000_107<tab>I really <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> happy when you invited me to play before. So I hope...I mean, would you be my friend?
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SAULINNE_000_108<tab>Hehehe! You silly!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SAULINNE_000_109<tab>I'm <var 1A 02 /var>already<var 1A 01 /var> your friend!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TENNY_000_115<tab>I want to send them something even better next year! Hmm, what should I make...
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SAULINNE_000_116<tab>We should tell Miss Garanjy the good news! Tenny and I will be right behind you.

TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_AMHGARANJY_000_120<tab>So not only were his handmade presents happily received, Tenny's friends sent him a thoughtful gift as well. None could ask for a better display of Starlight spirit.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_AMHGARANJY_000_121<tab>You have brightened many a young face today in your role as the Saint of Nymeia. It truly warms my heart!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_AMHGARANJY_000_122<tab>Still, I can't help but wonder if Tenny and his friends knew how fitting the gift of a woven bracelet is.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_AMHGARANJY_000_123<tab>In certain lands, such bracelets are customarily exchanged as a symbol of friendship, as it is said the intertwining strands represent lasting bonds.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_AMHGARANJY_000_124<tab>No doubt those younglings will enjoy each other's companionship for many a Starlight to come.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SAULINNE_000_125<tab>We came to say thank you! Thank you, Miss Garanjy. Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TENNY_000_126<tab>I'm grateful that I was able to keep my promise to my friends...and make another one along the way!

TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_AMHGARANJY_000_127<tab>I am glad to hear it. After all, the Starlight Celebration is meant to be enjoyed with everyone we cherish, be they near or far. Now then─what say you both to receiving your gifts?
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_AMHGARANJY_000_128<tab>I gave those two their presents earlier, but they seem to be in search of companions...
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_SAULINNE_000_129<tab>Let's invite them to play, Tenny!
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_TENNY_000_130<tab>Yeah! We can all celebrate together!

TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_GODBERT_000_131<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)A savior chosen to shield younglings from winter's wrath and provide them with every happiness this season can afford... Yet, not all gifts are within the saint's power to deliver.
TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_GODBERT_000_132<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)The gift of friendship, for instance...

TEXT_FESXMS902_04782_GODBERT_000_133<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)Forsooth, I can only teach them to make pretty things and encourage from afar! May their Starlights be bright and their friendship everlasting. Ho ho ho!
